IdeConnections%23vhgstbclone_kvasirselect 1, c1.line_id,c2.line_id,2,c1.the_date,c1.job_id,
0 load_id, bp_rel.full_name_2 as group_name from bifrost.stg_sap_mdm_bp_rel bp_rel join kvasir.v_customer c1 on c1.ssn=bp_rel.ssn_1 and c1.the_Date=date'2017-05-18' join kvasir.v_customer c2 on c2.ssn=bp_rel.ssn_2 and c2.the_date=date'2017-05-18' where date'2017-05-18' between valid_from and valid_to and c1.the_date=date'2017-05-18'
and c2.the_date=date'2017-05-18'
and bp_rel.company_control is not null and bp_rel.ssn_1 = '2010517899'
